page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT-SCOUTS
page.content: Every Friday night at 7.30 we meet at the 1st/3rd H/R scout H.Q. If it's a hot night we go to the fields and play some games. If not we stay inside the H.Q and do some scout work,for example learning to read maps,learning to tie knots and lashings etc. Every two weeks we go swimming at the Sports Centre,which is about a 7 minute walk away. When we go into the H.Q we put our bags down and pay our subs.,(20p). The subs.,go into scout funds to pay for equipment etc. Then we put on our uniform (green shirt,green beret, mushroom coloured trousers, yellow and purple scarf, leather belt) and have flag break(saluting the flag).Later we take our uniform off and play some games and then go onto some scout work.At the end of the meeting we lower the flag.We go home at about 8.30 often calling at the chip shop.
